question: A can do a work in 6 days and B in 9 days. How many days will both take together to complete the work?
explanation:
According to question. A can finish the whole work in 6 days.

(A+B)\'s one day\'s work = $latex \\left ( \\frac{1}{6}+\\frac{1}{9} \\right )=\\left ( \\frac{3+2}{18} \\right )=\\frac{5}{18}&s=1$
